sections.heading: Short title.
sections.text: This Act may be cited as the Local Government Financial Planning and Supervision Act.

sections.heading: Definitions.
sections.text:
As used in this Act, unless the context requires
otherwise:

sections.heading: Action by commission; financial advisor; liability.
sections.text: Action by commission; financial advisor; liability.

sections.heading: Powers of commission and financial advisor.
sections.text: Powers of commission and financial advisor.

sections.heading: Expenses of commission members.
sections.text:
The members of the financial
planning and supervision commission shall serve without compensation, but
shall be paid by the commission their necessary and actual expenses
incurred while engaged in the business of the commission.

sections.heading: Expenses incurred by commission. Any expense or obligation
sections.text:
incurred by the financial planning and supervision commission under this
Act shall be payable solely from appropriations made for that purpose by the
General Assembly.

sections.heading: Application of Act.
sections.text:
A unit of local government may by
contract declare that the provisions of this Act shall not apply to any
indebtedness, obligation or liability incurred under such contract.
